feed.title: SAP Community - SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central
feed.subtitle: SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: User-id for Concurrent employment
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I have questions regarding to user-id generation for concurrent employment via import.

Is it possible to auto populate or overwrite user-id by user-id created by Business Rule when importing Employment Details via Import Employee Data?

I know that field of "user-id" is mandatory when importing Employment Details. 

I created business rule to sequentially generate user-id for each Legal Entity. For example, if a concurrent employment is added for Legal Entity A, then the user-id will be generate from 11000000, and if it is added for Legal Entity B, then the user-id will be generate from 12000000.

I would like to know if it is possible to generate user-id based on the business rule when importing Employment Details. 

If it is impossible, I would like to know whether the user-id generated by the business rule can overwrite user-id imported by Employment Details.

SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central

entry.title: How to build custom extensions using BTP in SuccessFactors
entry.content:
Hello Everyone-

I am planning to build some custom apps./extensions or APIs using BTP in SuccessFactors . I have taken BTP trail a/c, and also SAP Build trial version,. There are some APIs in SAP Business Accelerator Hub but i am not understanding where to start and the step by step procerdure.

For example I mam trying to create a tile on SF Home page which will display total number of active employees in EC, How can this be done using BTP.

 

Please guide me.

entry.title: SAP successfactors integration with BTP- Custom apps & extensions
entry.content:
Hello Everyone-

I am planning to build some custom apps./extensions or APIs using BTP in SuccessFactors . I have taken BTP trail a/c, and also SAP Build trial version,. There are some APIs in SAP Business Accelerator Hub but i am not understanding where to start and the step by step procedure.

For example I mam trying to create a tile on SF Home page which will display total number of active employees in EC, How can this be done using BTP.

 

Please guide me.

entry.title: Define the selection method for the new business rule scenario following the deprecation of 'Base'
entry.content:
Hello everyone,
Starting from the first half of the 2024 release, it will no longer be possible to create new business rules using the "Basic" scenario.
SAP Help Portal | SAP Online Help

The ability to create new rules using the "Basic" rule scenario was deprecated on November 17, 2023, and was removed on June 2, 2024.

This change not only affects the creation of new business rules, but may also require updates to previously created rules in certain cases.

To prepare for such situations, we plan to create a reference list titled "Selecting Business Rule Scenarios Based on Requirements."
For example:
When entering a management allowance, if consistency is not maintained, an error message will be displayed. → In this case, use the "HRIS Element Validation" scenario.

We appreciate your insights and cooperation.
Let’s make this thread a reliable resource for mastering the selection of business rule scenarios.

entry.title: ISO27001 Certs
entry.content:
Hi, Could somebody please point me to a ISO27001 Certificate covering the operation of SuccessFactors hosted on GCP in Google DC's in Japan.... if such a thing exists?

Thanks

entry.title: Geozone Implementation
entry.content:
Hello,

We are looking to talk with other companies in North America that are using geozones to provide differentials based on locations. We want to be able to use one job code, and then based on locations have the differential applied, without maintaining multiple ranges. Has anyone achieved this? If not this process, how have you achieved this?

Thanks,

Kelly

entry.title: How to change the view of ask hr?
entry.content: Hello community, I'd like to change the view in Ask HR, as it has a plain white view with no colors, just the ticket count and statuses. Could you please guide me on how to change the layout, add colors, or even a corporate logo? Thank you for your support.

entry.title: Adding employee to Employee Central without an e-mail
entry.content:
Scenario:

A Customer uses Paradox ATS and Onboarding – not using SAP Recruiting or Onboarding.

They then need that employee to be added to Core HR employee central and the other SFSF modules. Can they be added without an e-mail? i.e. can they sign in with a phone number as a username and access the system that way? Or with a dummy e-mail address, not validate it, but use it as a username, set a password, and access the system on a mobile device?

Is there a similar workaround for Recruiting and/or Onboarding?

Thank you.

entry.title: SuccessFactors : Adding IP address in reporting
entry.content:
Dear All, 

I don't know if this is the right place, but I came across a KBA telling me that it's not possible to get the IP address of an user in reporting. 

Improvement Request Details - Customer Influence

Fortunately there is already a customer influence request, but so far, only 1 vote (plus mine). And I'm surprised that not more person are interested in this kind of information. Especially for API user and maybe some other scenarios (as mentioned in the request). 

So on top of adding some visibility to this request, I'm wondering if I'm not missing something and if there is not another way to get to this information ? 

Thanks, 

Christopher

entry.title: EC to HCM replication of position: Where can I influence on the data?
entry.content: I am looking for a possibility to influence on the data that is being saved during a replication of position data (tables HRP...) from EC to HCM. While for  employee data there is a BADI, I didn't find any for the position data. I am working on a 750 ABAP stack. Can anyone help with this?

entry.title: SAP Onbaording Email Notifications
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

In SAP ONB once we initiate the Onboarding process through the 'Add New Hire to Onboarding' page is it possible to have an email notification sent to the responsible Hiring Manager that a new Onboardee was added to the system and that they need to perform 'Review New Hire Data' step?

Any KBAs that you can recommend or if you have configured this before in a system?

Thank you!

entry.title: Prevent workflows from being approved after a certain date
entry.content:
Hi,

We use workflow approvals to manage time-off.
We currently have a rule to prevent submission before a certain date (Using Rules attached to the time type).

Problem is, managers are approving workflows for days requested in the past, where payroll for that period already closed.

For example, say you want a week off from September 1st until September 7th.  That payroll period is currently open...
So they will be able to submit the time-off and create the workflow just fine.

The problem comes when a manager approves this but it's too late.... for example, If the manager approves this on September 2nd, this will be late for payroll, as on September 2nd, the pay period is already closed.

Is there any way to prevent a Workflow from being approved after a certain date?

entry.title: SAP SuccessFactors Reporting - Aggregated Columns Label Field Issue
entry.content:
Hi Folks,

I am writing this to raise a flag about an issue with the Reporting Tool in SAP SuccessFactors .  When field labels are used in Aggregated columns Filters, the Error getting Preview issue is raised and the Report doesn't produce any results. The Report works as expected when the same field with Name is used. For example, in my instance I want to filter a specific pay component, when pay component (label) field is used, The Error getting preview issue is thrown and the report does not produce any results. When Pay Component (Name) field is used in the filter, it works as expected.

Requesting the Reporting Team to work on this and provide with a fix to have consistent behavior with all the fields when used in the filters.

entry.title: Receiving CompetencyMigrationFailuresCheck when Language is Deactivated
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We have JDM 1.0 and Competency Library 2.1 with 9 languages. Among them are Spanish (Spain) and Spanish (Mexico) languages, but we disabled the Spanish (Spain) as we don't want to use it.

Recently we updated our JDM 1.0 to JPB and found that we are receiving an error when we run Check Tool on JPB post migration. The error shows as CompetencyMigrationFailuresCheck. And this shows all the Spanish (Spain) translation as errors.

But, when we enable Spanish (Spain) language in the system, and run the check tool, then were no errors popped up and the check tool says No issues found.

This behavior seems to be not as expected. Why the Check Tool shows above error when we disable Spanish (Spain) language but No issues when we enable Spanish (Spain) language.

Appreciate if any guidance on it. Please let us know if any one faced this type of issue  or how they fixed it.

Regards,
Balaji

entry.title: Absence return date show always
entry.content:
Hello All,

how do i configure longtimeabsences to show the field "Absence return date" always and not only when i edit a absence

entry.title: Completing Learning Journey over several Practice System enrollments
entry.content:
If I don't finish the Configuring SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Core Learning Journey during the course of one enrollment with a Practice System I have understood that I will need to redo all the configuration I did in the old system enrollment (but lost when the enrollment expired) in the new system enrollment in order to continue on where I am currently in the Learning Journey, correct? If so, what is the most important parts of the Practice System setup that I should take screenshots of in order to speed up my learning when going into new Practice System enrollments? Also, are there any limits as to how many times one can enroll back2back?
 
I'm learning this whilst working full time for a client.
 
Thanks!

entry.title: ECP Point to point integration troubleshooting
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I am new to ptp integration and I have a question if there is a possibility to see what are exact target fields mapped in integration.

Source fields from EC are understandable, but Is there any possibility to see in some table that would hold information like Source field VS target fields mapping, not like EC property and ERP code in customizing but rather target field as Nachn, Vorna etc...

Thanks,

entry.title: Cross Allocation of costs for an employee - Possible configuration in EC
entry.content:
Hello Support,

 

The customer asked us if it possible to manage in SSF a particular scenario for some employees present in the company, in which there is a split of cost allocation percentages.

The customer has employees with the following characteristics:

  1. Employees working in different Legal Entities with varying allocation percentages.
  2. Employees formally hired by one Legal Entity, but an additional portion of their cost must be allocated to another Legal Entity
  3. etc

The customer is looking for a standard way to manage such cases in SuccessFactors. Specifically, they would like to track the percentage of cost allocation in the "second" Legal Entity and send this data to an external system.

Are there any standard configurations available to support this type of cross-entity cost allocation?

Thank you

entry.title: OpenText training and certification for SAP resellers
entry.content:
Boost Your Services. Build Customer Trust. Get Certified.

Over half of SAP license and cloud sales involve a trusted partner. With sales growth of more than 27% projected in the coming year, there’s never been a better time to strengthen your offering for 2025/2026.

SAP and OpenText are excited to launch the updated training and certification program for SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core by OpenText (also known as OpenText Core Content Management for SAP SuccessFactors ).

Why this matters for you and your customers
If your customers use SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central but lack a fully integrated HR document management solution, you have a perfect opportunity to deliver sustainable, transformational change. With the SaaS solution SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core, you can help your customers:

  • Streamline onboarding and HR processes with automation and workflows.

Provide secure, role-based access to employee files from within SAP SuccessFactors HCM

  • Meet data privacy requirements while ensuring complete employee files with records management
  • Improve HR communications with accurate and personalized employee documents

As SAP’s largest Solution Extension partner, OpenText offers a product that is SAP-tested, validated, and approved—giving your customers confidence in your services. Trained partners can deliver an integrated HR document management platform within weeks, providing your customers with a more compliant solution across the entire hire-to-retire cycle.

Why certification is essential
SAP will only provide full support for configurations implemented by certified partners. Without the badge, you risk delays and limitations in being able to provide the support your customers expect.

When you complete the course and pass the exam, you’ll be equipped to deliver exceptional customer experiences when implementing SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core. Certification will showcase to customers you’re ready.

You can also grow your revenue with expanded services such as advanced document workflows, intelligent capture, AI and API integrations. Explore Standard or Premium individual learning subscriptions.

Get certified today

 Partner certification exam.

  • This is a scheduled 2-hour exam
  • Number for questions:  60
  • Questions format: The test includes question formats such as multiple choice and true/false.
  • Passing Score:  70%
  • Language: English
  • Investment: $500 USD (or your country's currency equivalent, excluding VAT or other taxes)
  • See also Additional Details, including certification validity & renewal and retakes policy information.

Prepare for the certification exam with solution training

If you want to enhance your customer service abilities and get closer to a 100% pass rate, we highly recommend that you enrol in a small group training program.

What you can expect

  • Two days of instructor-led training for SAP resellers (OpenText reseller status is not necessary). 
  • Available in English and German.
  • Investment: $2,400.00 USD (or local currency equivalent, excluding VAT and taxes).

What you’ll gain from the training

  • Live, interactive sessions led by expert trainers
  • Guidance on configuration, integration, and personalization.
  • Tools to deliver targeted, automated communications.
  • Preparation for the certification exam.
  • Promotion of your services through SAP and OpenText reseller channels.

Discover additional learning subscription options to continue your growth journey.

Ready to take the next step?
Register now for the upcoming virtual training session for SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core by OpenText. For more details, contact training@opentext.com.

Let’s work together to make every SAP SuccessFactors HCM project a success.

SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core by Open Text , HCM Employee Self-Service , Partnership ,

entry.title: Is there a way to dynamically display a recap of the position history on the people profile?
entry.content:
Hello all, 

 

Is there a standard feature (portlet, widget or configuration path) to display a recap of the position historic on the employee's people profile? 

e.g. Employee A's people profile > display a section which dynamically shows: 

- Position 3, entry date in the position, end date

- Position 2, entry date in the position, end date

- Position 1, entry date in the position, end date

Thank you

Best regards, 

Marion B.
